catalog_script_client.name: Holidays Validation

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_db2bf535977e4110002ffef3a253af40
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Car Rental Reservation">2627b0af97428110002ffef3a253afdf</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:575a78a397828110002ffef3a253af80</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Holidays Validation</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
	g_form.clearMessages();
	g_form.hideErrorBox('start_datetime');
	g_form.hideErrorBox('end_datetime');
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	var today = new Date();
	var startDateTime = new Date(newValue);
	var endDateTime = new Date(g_form.getValue('end_datetime'));
   // Get holidays
	var ga = new GlideAjax('getHolidays'); 
	ga.addParam("sysparm_name", "getHolidays"); 
	ga.addParam("sysparm_start", startDateTime);
	ga.addParam("sysparm_end", endDateTime);
	ga.getXML(getResponse);
}

function getResponse(response) {
	var holidays = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer'); 
	if (holidays == "") return;
	var holidayArr = holidayArr = holidays.split(',');

	if (holidayArr.length ) {
		g_form.showErrorBox('start_datetime', 'Reservations are not allowed on Holidays(' + holidayArr.toString() + ')');
		return;
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>maryanne.labasan</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-12 08:03:52</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>db2bf535977e4110002ffef3a253af40</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Holidays Validation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Car Rental Reservation" source="x_616811_car_renta">8025d70b974a0110002ffef3a253af0c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Car Rental Reservation">8025d70b974a0110002ffef3a253af0c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_db2bf535977e4110002ffef3a253af40</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>maryanne.labasan</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 08:21:07</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
